greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of digits in the mixed-base enumeration system n=...d(4)d(3)d(2)d(1), where the digits satisfy 0<=d(i)<=1 if i is odd, 0<=d(i)<=2 if i is even.
comment: Counting 0,1,2,3,... (base 10) in this mixed-base system proceeds as follows: 0,1,10,11,20,21,100,101,110,111,120,121,1000,...
formula: a(n)=a(n-1)+1 if n=1, 3, 5 mod 6; a(n)=a(n-1) if n=2, 4 mod 5; a(n)=a(n/6) if n=0 mod 6.
results.author: _John W. Layman_, Jan 15 2004
